pros: Love the simplicity and that it's in the status bar!
cons: Newer version does not show Day+Month+Year % at the same time. Older does. I like the very first version.
body: Well worth $5. So I paid it!Newer version with the progress bar is nice, but older version with "Day: 65% Month: 73% Year: 31%" is way more pragmatic and useful for me.Raman Shalupau has used this product for one week.

reviewer_tagline: A web developer, digital nomad, wizard
body: It's a minimal useful app which can give you the motivation you need by showing the cold-blooded fact: how much time has already passed. It might feel stressful at first, but it actually depends on the way you look at it. I got used to it and now it doesn't stress me at all =]Fyodor Ivanischev has used this product for one week.

pros: Love the simplicity and that it's in the status bar!
cons: Newer version does not show Day+Month+Year % at the same time. Older does. I like the very first version.

reviewer_tagline: A web developer, digital nomad, wizard
body: It's a minimal useful app which can give you the motivation you need by showing the cold-blooded fact: how much time has already passed. It might feel stressful at first, but it actually depends on the way you look at it. I got used to it and now it doesn't stress me at all =]Fyodor Ivanischev has used this product for one week.

cons: Installs as untrusted code that has full access to your machine
body: Nice idea, so I bought the app.I just wish it would be a signed app - as it is now, it’s from an "Unidentified Developer", and I need to go through System Preferences to install it; makes me very uncomfortable to install untrusted code that has full access to everything I do on my machine.I don't mind 5$, but access to my machine is too high a price for the value.Andreas Pizsa has used this product for one day.

pros: Well gives a way to track remaining time on earth
cons: Pay $5 to get a countdown clock when it can be done for free
body: Same can be enabled using bitbar plugin that i use. Pasting gist @ https://gist.github.com/wnds/64a41f891a5a6abe1c58f346061e5b95Vivek has never used this product.
Tiny little app that looks great in my OSX menu bar!Pieter Levels has used this product for one week.

reviewer_tagline: I am stuck in a loop of building 🛠 🚀
pros: A nice swift kick in the B every now and then. Love the concept
body: Going to review this on the next youtube episode of Maker's Journal. Stay tuned 👌Dinuka Jayasuriya has used this product for one day.
All technology is a time machine. Get your life back by treating it so. Chris Dancy has used this product for one day.
